content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the foundation for the authority of the TSA (a division of the Department of Homeland Security) for developing screening policies, and explain how the implementation of these security policies may impact civil liberties. Explain how the scenario illustrates the role of civil servants in the federal government. Describe an action a Congressional committee could take if passengers object to the policies detailed in the scenario, and explain how these actions could impact the future implementation of TSA security policies.
